feed.title: Nextcloud Tables Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Nextcloud Tables: v0.8.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: Bump version to 0.8.0-dev.1 by @juliushaertl in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/995
  • feat: create new table from import by @luka-nextcloud in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/915
  • fix: Properly set random icon on load by @juliushaertl in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1001
  • chore(deps): update dependency @nextcloud/browserslist-config to ^3.0.1 (main) by @renovate in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1012
  • fix(deps): update dependency @nextcloud/router to ^3.0.1 (main) by @renovate in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1016
  • fix(deps): update dependency @nextcloud/auth to ^2.3.0 (main) by @renovate in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1017
  • Updating appstore-build-publish.yml workflow from template by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1010
  • fix(filter): pass datetime object for PARAM_DATE by @blizzz in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1023
  • Fix filters for meta columns by @juliushaertl in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1002
  • test(Integration): add contexts related tests by @blizzz in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/970
  • [main] chore(release): Bump version to 0.7.1 by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1033
  • fix(App): unstuck navbar focus on internal entries by @blizzz in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1038
  • fix(occ): Fix occ tables:update by defining the description option and making title optional by @nickvergessen in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1045
  • fix(deps): update tiptap to ^2.3.1 (main) by @renovate in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1051
  • chore(deps): update dependency @nextcloud/babel-config to ^1.1.1 (main) by @renovate in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1052
  • fix(deps): update dependency @nextcloud/axios to ^2.5.0 (main) by @renovate in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1053
  • fix(deps): update dependency @nextcloud/l10n to v3 (main) by @renovate in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1055
  • fix(deps): update dependency @nextcloud/l10n to ^3.0.1 (main) by @renovate in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1057
  • enh(Contexts): set active navigation entry by @blizzz in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1037
  • perf: Avoid extra queries to get the view ownership by @juliushaertl in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1062
  • perf: Make cache usable for unfavorited entries by @juliushaertl in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1063
  • fix(DB): update tables_row_sleeves' sequence after migration by @blizzz in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1049
  • enh: Delete Application and its shares by @enjeck in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1026
  • ci(integration): tests against context deletion by @blizzz in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1042
  • chore(deps): update dependency @nextcloud/stylelint-config to v3 (main) by @renovate in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1054
  • enh(App): navigation tweaks for Contexts by @blizzz in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1080
  • fix(deps): update tiptap to ^2.3.2 (main) by @renovate in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1086
  • fix(deps): update dependency @nextcloud/l10n to ^3.1.0 (main) by @renovate in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1087
  • fix(l10n): grammar fixes for table char limits by @roliverio in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1084
  • fix(DB): fetch pageId as int by @blizzz in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1083
  • Enhancement/279 pagination for tables ui by @grnd-alt in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/972
  • feat: update error handling during import by @luka-nextcloud in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1091
  • chore(deps): update dependency @nextcloud/babel-config to ^1.2.0 (main) by @renovate in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1093
  • chore(deps): update dependency @nextcloud/eslint-config to ^8.4.1 (main) by @renovate in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1094
  • fix(deps): update dependency @nextcloud/event-bus to ^3.3.0 (main) by @renovate in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1095
  • fix(deps): update tiptap to ^2.4.0 (main) by @renovate in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1096
  • chore(deps): update dependency openapi-typescript to ^6.7.6 (main) by @renovate in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1106
  • fix(deps): update dependency debounce to ^2.1.0 (main) by @renovate in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1108
  • fix #1099 cosmetic bug: 3 typos throw Error('Form ' + form + ' does no exist') need correction by @kirisakow in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1102
  • fix: reduce templates requests by @luka-nextcloud in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1098
  • fix(Context): do not show hidden columns by @blizzz in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1092
  • fix(deps): update dependency @vueuse/core to ^10.10.0 (main) by @renovate in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1115
  • fix(deps): update dependency @nextcloud/event-bus to ^3.3.1 (main) by @renovate in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1114
  • test(cypress): fix month names by @blizzz in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1119
  • feat: submit row details with ctrl + enter by @luka-nextcloud in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1112
  • ci(integration): tests against context updates by @blizzz in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1072
  • chore(CI): Updating pr-feedback.yml workflow from template by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1117
  • add table_id index to oc_tables_columns by @grnd-alt in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1078
  • fix: broken sort by date by @luka-nextcloud in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1110
  • test(integration): cases against context transfer ownership by @blizzz in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1124
  • ci(integration): test against context sharing by @blizzz in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1129
  • fix(Controller): remove unneeded endpoints by @blizzz in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1130
  • chore(deps): Update openapi-extractor by @provokateurin in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1116
  • fix(View): 'manageTable' array key is not always set by @blizzz in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1136
  • ci(integration): add more share-related tests by @blizzz in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1137
  • fix(deps): update dependency @vueuse/core to ^10.11.0 (main) by @renovate in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1142
  • [main] Fix npm audit by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1145
  • enh: gitignore Cypress download folder by @enjeck in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1144
  • fix: hide Create Column button on empty table if inadequate permissions by @enjeck in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1151
  • fix: insert context startpage for proper update by @enjeck in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1146
  • fix: add aria-label to NcSelect by @enjeck in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1148
  • fix: pass view as prop to EmptyView by @enjeck in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1147
  • use a built-in JS function localeCompare() to compare strings by @kirisakow in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1141
  • chore(deps): update dependency cypress-downloadfile to ^1.2.4 (main) by @renovate in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1162
  • chore(deps): update dependency openapi-typescript to v7 (main) by @renovate in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1163
  • [main] Fix npm audit by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1165
  • fix(API): declared array shape was not correct by @blizzz in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1169
  • ci: add missing server branches to matrices by @blizzz in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1168
  • enh(API): add OCS API to create rows by @blizzz in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1161
  • enh: Consolidate user/group search code by @enjeck in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1025
  • feat: edit/create rows from tables interactive content widget by @elzody in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/952
  • fix: only add resource if user can manage resource by @enjeck in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1160
  • Extract selection option labels for Analytics by @Rello in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/877
  • chore: Drop Nextcloud 26 for the next release as it is EOL by @juliushaertl in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1179
  • enh: add context e2e tests by @enjeck in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1149
  • fix: modify context nodes update by @enjeck in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1178
  • fix(Backend): use object over loose array for permissions by @blizzz in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1173
  • fix(deps): update dependency @nextcloud/vue to ^8.14.0 (main) by @renovate in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1085
  • chore(deps): update dependency openapi-typescript to ^7.0.2 (main) by @renovate in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1185
  • fix(api): Fix wrong array type by @provokateurin in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1205
  • fix: flaky Cypress tests by @enjeck in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1204
  • fix(deps): update tiptap to ^2.5.4 (main) by @renovate in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1201
  • chore: update workflows from templates by @skjnldsv in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1200
  • fix: remove View filter with null column by @enjeck in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1199
  • fix(Capabilities): announce API 2.0 by @blizzz in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1215
  • feat: Add events for row added and row updated by @come-nc in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1101
  • fix(files): remove pagination of there is just one page by @JuliaKirschenheuter in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1218
  • build(openapi): fix ms typescript generation command by @blizzz in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1221
  • chore(deps): update dependency openapi-typescript to ^7.1.0 (main) by @renovate in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1222
  • fix(View): column might be saved as null by @blizzz in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1196
  • fix(files): fix width, background of table row and interval between table header by @JuliaKirschenheuter in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1220
  • feat(import): change column format during import by @luka-nextcloud in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/944
  • add scheme import and export by @grnd-alt in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1170
  • Align button to the left side by @JuliaKirschenheuter in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1240
  • fix(files): align icon to center by @JuliaKirschenheuter in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1219
  • fix(files): remove unneeded extra place for the rows by @JuliaKirschenheuter in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1234
  • chore: bump 0.8.0-dev.0 to version 0.8.0-beta.1 by @JuliaKirschenheuter in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1243
  • fix(files): fix appstore-build-publish.yml by @JuliaKirschenheuter in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1244
  • fix(deps): update tiptap to ^2.5.7 (main) by @renovate in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1245
  • fix(deps): update dependency @nextcloud/vue to ^8.15.0 (main) by @renovate in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1246
  • feat: add backend for new user/group column by @enjeck in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1090
  • Analytics: permission error on shared tables with non-shared views by @Rello in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1248
  • fix: Navigation table entries UI issues by @enjeck in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1195
  • feat: User/group column frontend by @enjeck in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1113
  • fix: Make user listing in table more consistent by using NcUserBubble by @juliushaertl in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1254
  • Prepare for release v0.8.0-beta.2 by @JuliaKirschenheuter in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1260
  • fix(deps): update dependency @nextcloud/vue to ^8.15.1 (main) by @renovate in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1262
  • fix(deps): update tiptap to ^2.5.8 (main) by @renovate in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1263
  • chore(deps): update dependency openapi-typescript to ^7.3.0 (main) by @renovate in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1264
  • [main] Fix npm audit by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1271
  • fix/ui quirks by @juliushaertl in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1259
  • fix: Avoid variable access on unhandled exception and lower log level for expected permission check failures by @juliushaertl in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1274
  • fix(deps): update dependency @nextcloud/vue to ^8.16.0 (main) by @renovate in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1278
  • fix: ensure default values show as filled by @enjeck in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1176
  • Add reuse compliance - Part 1 by @AndyScherzinger in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1277
  • chore: Proper logs with error level and exception trace by @juliushaertl in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1217
  • Add SPDX header - Part 2 by @AndyScherzinger in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1279
  • Add SPDX header - Part 3 by @AndyScherzinger in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1280
  • fix(deps): update dependency @vueuse/core to ^10.11.1 (main) by @renovate in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1284
  • fix(deps): update tiptap to ^2.5.9 (main) by @renovate in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1285
  • [main] Fix npm audit by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1286
  • fix: use different app menu selectors by @enjeck in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1292
  • fix: only focus on input if modal is open by @enjeck in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1282
  • fix(deps): update dependency @nextcloud/auth to ^2.4.0 (main) by @renovate in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1297
  • fix(deps): update tiptap to ^2.6.4 (main) by @renovate in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1298
  • fix(deps): update dependency @vueuse/core to v11 (main) by @renovate in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1300
  • [main] Fix npm audit by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1301
  • chore(deps): Update openapi-extractor to v1.0.0 by @provokateurin in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1303
  • build(NC): bump max compatible NC version by @blizzz in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1310
  • fix: improve style alignment and heights by @enjeck in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1307
  • fix: unhide part of single selection NcSelect value by @enjeck in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1293
  • fix: Open row edit modal on initial load by @juliushaertl in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1312
  • fix(deps): update dependency @vueuse/core to ^11.0.1 (main) by @renovate in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1315
  • fix(deps): update tiptap to ^2.6.6 (main) by @renovate in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1316
  • fix(deps): update dependency @nextcloud/vue to ^8.17.0 (main) by @renovate in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1317
  • fix(deps): update dependency @vueuse/core to ^11.0.3 (main) by @renovate in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1318
  • [main] Fix npm audit by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1319
  • repair schema export and import by @grnd-alt in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1321
  • ci(behat): allow to specify scenario via env var by @blizzz in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1324
  • bump version to 0.8.0-beta-3 by @grnd-alt in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1327
  • chore: update workflows from templates by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1314
  • fix(deps): update dependency @nextcloud/dialogs to v5 (main) by @renovate in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1329
  • fix(deps): update dependency @nextcloud/files to ^3.8.0 (main) by @renovate in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1018
  • Migrate NcModal to NcDialog by @JuliaKirschenheuter in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1239
  • ci: Update npm-audit-fix.yml to match tables app branches by @juliushaertl in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1330
  • Fix console warnings and errors by @juliushaertl in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1328
  • feat: Use simple input field instead of multiselect for plain URLs by @juliushaertl in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/787
  • chore(deps): update dependency openapi-typescript to ^7.3.3 (main) by @renovate in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1332
  • fix(deps): update dependency @nextcloud/vue to ^8.17.1 (main) by @renovate in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1333
  • [main] Fix npm audit by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1334
  • chore(CI): Updating renovate-approve-merge.yml workflow from template by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1337
  • fix: check sorting array is non-empty by @enjeck in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1338
  • fix: reduce arguments for column creation function by @luka-nextcloud in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1281
  • chore(deps): update dependency openapi-typescript to ^7.4.0 (main) by @renovate in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1343
  • fix(deps): update dependency @nextcloud/files to ^3.9.0 (main) by @renovate in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1344
  • ci: Update workflows by @nickvergessen in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1345
  • fix: Remove deleted resource from associated applications by @enjeck in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1156
  • fix: use actions/upload-artifact v4 for cypress workflow by @enjeck in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1348
  • fix(Cypress): remove unneeded visibility check by @enjeck in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1347
  • refactor(Rows): switch front-end to use Row OCS API by @blizzz in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1351
  • feat: share Application with groups by @enjeck in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1311
  • chore: bump version to 0.8.0 by @enjeck in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1352

New Contributors

  • @nickvergessen made their first contribution in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1045
  • @kirisakow made their first contribution in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1102
  • @come-nc made their first contribution in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1101
  • @AndyScherzinger made their first contribution in https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/pull/1277

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/compare/v0.7.5...v0.8.0

entry.title: New release for Nextcloud Tables: v0.8.1
entry.content:
Fixed

  • fix: check for null in import preview (tables#1410)

Dependencies

  • Fix npm audit (tables#1395)

Other

  • refactor: Extend Permission Middleware usage and replace deprecated annotations with attributes (tables#1407)
  • fix: use unique names for actions upload-artifact (tables#1408)

entry.title: New release for Nextcloud Tables: v0.8.2
entry.content:
Fixed

  • fix and improve detection and import of ods, xlsx and csv documents (tables#1478)
  • enh: use tiptap's editor to render HTML (tables#1489)
  • fix return status in a few cases and add integration tests against content modification through Applications (tables#1423)

Dependencies

  • Fix npm audit (tables#1475)

Other

  • build(dev-deps): update phpunit for PHP 8.4 compat (tables#1479)

entry.title: New release for Nextcloud Tables: v0.8.3
entry.content:
Fixed

  • [stable0.8] fix(Import): expect selectionOptions as array from json (tables#1425)
  • [stable0.8] fix: use actual providerId in link rows (tables#1498)
  • [stable0.8] Fix "start of week" filter not working on table views (tables#1512)
  • [stable0.8] fix: allow adding meta data columns to views again (tables#1530)
  • [stable0.8] fix(Views): allow to sort for meta columns (tables#1533)

Other

  • dependency updates

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nextcloud/tables/compare/v0.8.2...v0.8.3

entry.title: New release for Nextcloud Tables: v0.8.4
entry.content:
Fixed

  • [stable0.8] fix(Favorites): repair runtime cache population (tables#1543)
  • [stable0.8] enh: warn during table manager promotion/demotion (tables#1552)
  • [stable0.8] chore(i18n): Improved wording (tables#1564)
  • [stable0.8] enh(Cypress): improve some selectors (tables#1573)
  • [stable0.8] fix: wrap usergroup's cell values (tables#1563)

Dependencies

  • [stable0.8] deps(PHP): update phpoffice/phpspreadsheet (tables#1562)
  • [stable0.8] Fix npm audit (tables#1586)
